about_the_game:
Bring back the color to the magical world of planet Ayries!

Set off on an incredible journey to other planets together with Snoody and his friend Picke. Explore distant worlds, study elemental magic, collect crystals, and defeat monsters!
Save the wonderful people of ayrie and find out who is responsible for their troubles.

Snoody: One of the Ayrie is an adventure action game that will acquaint you with the amazing planet of Ayris and its brave inhabitants, one of whom is destined to become a true hero.

Exciting Journey Awaits You

On the fastest spacecraft, you will travel to the distant corners of outer space in search of unique colored crystals. What will the unexplored planets be like, who inhabits them, and whether they will be willing to share this valuable resource — all of this you will discover together with the brave ayrie and his friend.

Fight against Monsters

Along your path, you will encounter various dangers: aggressive local inhabitants, tricky traps, mysterious dungeons, and abandoned temples. To overcome all obstacles, Snoody has a Magic Book and a staff that changes its abilities under the influence of runes.

Study Magic

Search every corner of the planet to uncover hidden stashes with magic runes that grant new abilities to Snoody's staff. Some runes will teach elemental attacks, others aid in healing, and some provide defense against the most fearsome enemies. Combine them according to your own preferences.

Save the Planet Ayris

Search for crystals and fill the Prisms entrusted to Snoody by the elders. Each Prism can bring back one color to Ayris. Restore them all to make Snoody's homeland shine with all the colors of the rainbow, just as it did before.

Game Features

  • Vibrant cartoon graphics
  • Plenty of different enemies
  • Unique environment on each planet
  • Combat system based on combining magic runes
  • High level of difficulty

This is only the first of many chapters in Snoody's story. Whether his heroic mission will continue depends solely on you — our players!


ABOUT THE PROJECT

This game is created as part of the GameDev Experience Stables project, which aims to develop a complete gaming product and help all participants find jobs in the GameDev industry.

Over 120 people wanted to take part in the project, and after numerous interviews, a team of 27 specialists of different levels was formed. Although the recruitment process took only two weeks, we were forming as a team throughout the whole project.

We managed to achieve incredible results, which you can appreciate:
- Assembled a strong and talented team.
- Created a Game Design Document (GDD) that describes all aspects of the full game.
- Developed a flexible modular architecture for the game that makes it easy to scale the project.
- Produced numerous beautiful artistic concepts.
- Modeled and animated excellent 3D models.
- Composed a musical soundtrack.
And the best part is, there's a game you can play!

The project started on December 15, 2022, and within 4 months, our creation came to life.

Unfortunately, due to the short timeframe, we were unable to implement many of our ideas:
- We intended to create four distinct planets, each with its own unique inhabitants.
- In the Magic Book, we wanted to implement the ability to mix different elements to discover deadly synergies.
- We planned to add quest chains, mini-games, and spaceship defense mechanics to the game.
Numerous ideas were suggested and documented, but their implementation came down to time and financial costs. I would like to remind you that our project is non-commercial, and everything you see has been done voluntarily by wonderful people!


OUR AMAZING TEAM


Thank you for your interest in the project! Please help Snoody save the planet and don't forget to leave any feedback about our game!
